mutants.code:
def productExceptSelf(nums):
    length = len(nums)
    answer = [0] / length
    answer[0] = 1
    for i in range(1, length):
        answer[i] = nums[i - 1] * answer[i - 1]
    R = 1
    for i in reversed(range(length)):
        answer[i] = answer[i] * R
        R *= nums[i]
    return answer

    length = len(nums)

    R = 1
    for i in reversed(range(length)):
        answer[i] = answer[i] * R
        R *= nums[i]
    return answer
